name: Explosive Savant
summary: A lifetime wielding firearms and explosive ordinance amid the chaos of battle has granted you great skill with volatile weapons.
description:
A lifetime wielding firearms and explosive ordinance amid the chaos of battle has granted you great skill with volatile weapons. You become trained in simple and martial bombs and firearms.Explosive Savant Leads To...

Explosive ExpertTraitsDwarf: A creature with this trait is a member of the dwarf ancestry. Dwarves are stout folk who often live underground and typically have darkvision. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by dwarves. An item with this trait is created and used by dwarves.

Uncommon: Something of uncommon rarity requires special training or comes from a particular culture or part of the world. Some character choices give access to uncommon options, and the GM can choose to allow access for anyone. Less is known about uncommon creatures than common creatures. They typically can't be summoned. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to these creature is increased by 2.
